Living room/dining room has built-in sitting bench. Teak/Granite kitchen cabinetry with plenty of counter space, double sink, and pantry. Built-in microwave and an oven are included. Laundry conveniently located in the house with extra storage space. 2 good size bedrooms both offering A/C and stunning French doors to the outside. This home is ideally situated with amenities nearby in Labuduwa Galle.

column2: 3 Br Luxury House for Sale - Labuduwa Galle
column6: Wonderful 3 Bedrooms luxury house for a couple or young family offering open concept living/dining space. The main living space offers super titanium cut floors. Living room/dining room has built-in sitting bench. Teak/Granite kitchen cabinetry with plenty of counter space, double sink, and pantry. Built-in microwave and an oven are included. Laundry conveniently located in the house with extra storage space. 2 good size bedrooms both offering A/C and stunning French doors to the outside. Large 3 piece bathrooms offers separate shower, granite counter top and high-end fittings. This house comes with 2 oversize parking spaces finished with pressed concrete tiles. This home is ideally situated with amenities nearby in Labuduwa Galle.

column2: Beach Land W/ House for Sale - Galle
column6: A Small Beach land for sale  in-between  Hikkaduwa and Galle fort overlooking the Pittiwalla Bay. Located in a highly sought after  upcoming  residentialarea surrounded by foreign owned boutique hotels, guest houses and hostels this land is perfect as a small investment for a  residence or business.Two old houses requiring renovation exist on the land so as per the law  planning permissions for renovations and construction will be granted by the Urban Development Authority. The sale price reflects only the land value. The front of the land overlooks the Galle road and the rear land overlooks the indian ocean with stunning sunsets.Clear Title Deed for quick sale.
